title: Noam Chomsky: Capitalism is Dead #capitalism #noamchomsky #shorts
description:
Noam Chomsky believes capitalism is self-destructive and world never had a real capitalist system. What United States have, he believes, is a state-capitalism in which business is checked and supported by the American government
